user.title: Baby Care Tracker
user.description: Set up tracking for your baby's care activities

entity_mapping.title: Button & Entity Mapping
entity_mapping.description: Map physical buttons and smart devices to baby care actions. Select entities from the dropdown or leave blank to disable. When these entities change state, the corresponding baby care action will be triggered automatically.

abort.already_configured: Baby Care Tracker is already configured for this baby

select_entities.title: Select Entities
select_entities.description: Choose the buttons, switches, or other entities you want to use for baby care actions.

assign_actions.title: Assign Actions
assign_actions.description: Assign baby care actions to your selected entities. Each entity can trigger one action when activated.
